quizzes.title: Science Quiz: Movie and Actor
quizzes.description: Test your science knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Science, actor, john. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who is the Terminator programmed to kill in the 1984 movie The Terminator?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sarah Connor

questions.question: Dreamgirls earned eight nominations in 2007, but not one for Best Picture. When was the last film before Dreamgirls with so many nominations that failed to also capture that top nomination?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1973

questions.question: What does the popular movie and book murderer Sweeney Todd do with the bodies of his victims?

options.text: He makes them into meat pies.
He chops them into small pieces and buries them in different places.
He feeds his dogs to them.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He makes them into meat pies.

questions.question: Alphonse Gabriel Capone, a.k.a. Al Capone, was a real American criminal who inspired many movie and book characters. How did the real Al Capone die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cardiac arrest

questions.question: What actor portrayed Count Dracula in the 1992 horror movie Dracula?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gary Oldman

questions.question: Prior to the awards in 2007, when was the last movie in which co-stars won the Oscars for Best Actor and Best Actress?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: As Good As It Gets

questions.question: Which of these is the first family in movie history that includes three different Oscar winners?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Garland/Minnellis

questions.question: The nickname Oscar was bestowed on the golden statuette in honor of what person?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No one knows for sure

questions.question: Only 83 members of the Hollywood Foreign Press Association are eligible to vote for the Golden Globe Awards. With the 13 new members of 2007, the number of members of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences eligible to vote for the Oscars became what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 5830

questions.question: Norman Bates is a popular book and film villain. Whose personality does he assume as a result from a dissociative identity disorder?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His mothers

questions.question: What is the sin that murderer John Doe saves for last in the 1995 movie Seven?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wrath

questions.question: What was the first movie in color to win the Best Picture Academy Award?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gone with the Wind

questions.question: What type of people did Jack the Ripper, who inspired many film characters, kill in 1888?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Prostitutes

questions.question: What actor was interested in the role of The Joker in the 2008 movie The Dark Knight before it was given to Heath Ledger?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Who is the first actor/actress to win an Oscar for playing a member of the opposite sex?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Linda Hunt

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Blair Witch Project
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, macguff. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: How many of the Top 10 American films of all time (as chosen by the American Film Institute), did NOT win an Oscar for Best Picture?

options.text: None. They all won the Best Picture Award.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Four

questions.question: Before the release of the The Blair Witch Project, the actors in the film were listed as missing and presumed dead on the popular movie website IMDb (Internet Movie Database).
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: This actress stars as the  young  pregnant Juno MacGuff in the movie Juno.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ellen Page

questions.question: This actor, who stars as the teenage father in Juno, was also in at least 53 episodes of Arrested  Development as George-Michael Bluth.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Cera

questions.question: This actress plays Vanessa Loring, the woman who wants to adopt Junos child in the movie Juno. She acted in Felicity with first husband Scott Foley but has a child with second husband, Ben Affleck.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jennifer Garner

questions.question: In what year was The Blair Witch Project released?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1999

questions.question: How long did it take to film The Blair Witch Project?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 8 days

questions.question: There was a sequel to the movie The Blair Witch Project.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What state was the setting of the film The Blair Witch Project?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maryland

questions.question: The Discovery Channel did a real documentary based on the events surrounding The Blair Witch Project prior to the movies release.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: The budget for the film The Blair Witch Project was only $50,000.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What year did the events in the fictional film The Blair Witch Project take place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1994

questions.question: The movie The Blair Witch Project is based on a real legend.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of these is a 1993 black and white movie that won the Best Picture Award?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Schindlers List

questions.question: Who was Marlon Brandos appointed spokesperson at the 1973 Academy Awards who went on stage to refuse his Best Actor Oscar citing Hollywoods misrepresentation of Native Americans?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sacheen Littlefeather

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Mel Brooks and Juno
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, macguff. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Steven Christopher Parker, who plays a student in Juno, is probably more famous to TV viewers as Harold Zelinsky in this show.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ER

questions.question: What is Mel Brooks birth name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Melvin Kaminsky

questions.question: This actress, who plays Leah on Juno, is more famous for her roles in Kidnapped and United 93.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Olivia Thirlby

questions.question: This actor plays Mac MacGuff in Juno. He is Spidermans boss in the Spiderman movies and a shrink on Law and Order.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: J.K. Simmons

questions.question: For which of these films did Mel Brooks win an Academy Award?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Producers

questions.question: This actor, famous as Dwight Shrute on The Office, plays Rollo in Juno.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rainn Wilson

questions.question: The script for Spaceballs, a Mel Brooks parody of the Star Wars and Star Trek franchises, was approved by George Lucas.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of the following films was not directed by Mel Brooks?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Jerk

questions.question: Which of these actors has not appeared in three or more Mel Brooks films?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cleavon Little

questions.question: This tall beauty plays Bren MacGuff in Juno but she may be more famous as C.J. Cregg on The West Wing.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Allison Janney

questions.question: He plays Steve Randazzo in Juno and Sean in Degrassi: The Next Generation.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Daniel Clark

questions.question: How many children does Mel Brooks have from his two marriages?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 4

questions.question: Which Mel Brooks film is not on the American Film Institutes list of 100 funniest American films?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: High Anxiety

questions.question: How long was Mel Brooks married to his second wife?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1964 - 2005

questions.question: How many films did Mel Brooks write and direct from 1968 to 1995?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 11

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Film and St. Elmos Fire
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, kevins. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of the actor who plays Kirbys boss at St. Elmos bar in the movie St. Elmos Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Blake Clark

questions.question: In the film St. Elmos Fire, what is the major colour of Jules apartment?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pink

questions.question: In the film St. Elmos Fire, Wendy tells Billy that she made what type of sandwich on her first night living alone?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peanut butter and jelly

questions.question: What was the full name of Demi Moores character in the film St. Elmos Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jules Jacoby

questions.question: How many Mel Brooks films, released in the period 1968-1995, were recast into Broadway musicals?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2

questions.question: Who directed the 1985 movie St. Elmos Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joel Schumacher

questions.question: In the movie St. Elmos Fire, Martin Balsam played the father of the character Leslie Hunter.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What was the name of Kevins first byline in the film St. Elmos Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Meaning of Life

questions.question: What type of cigarettes does Kevin give Billy in St. Elmos Fire, when he boards the bus to leave D.C?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Newport

questions.question: In the film St. Elmos Fire, for her marriage with Howie, Wendy received from her dad a car made by what company?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chrysler

questions.question: The actor who played Jules neighbor Ron in St. Elmos Fire also played David Silvers dad on Beverly Hills 90210.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Where was Billy from the movie St. Elmos Fire working, when Jules locked herself in her apartment?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a gas station

questions.question: Mel Brooks has received which of the following major entertainment awards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Who sang the theme song to St. Elmos Fire, subtitled Man in Motion?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Parr

questions.question: Alec Newbary was a democrat in the beginning of the film St. Elmos Fire, but later went to work for a Republican senator.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Comedy
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, stars. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the movie St. Elmos Fire, during the night Billy fights Felicias husband, his shirt is covered with images of what creature?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: bats

questions.question: Wendy Beamish, a character from St. Elmos Fire, worked as a welfare counselor.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of the Marx Brothers appeared in the 1933 comedy movie Duck Soup?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Where does Charlie Chaplins character the Little Tramp work in the 1936 movie Modern Times?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In a factory

questions.question: What famous singer and actress starred in the 1972 comedy movie Whats Up, Doc??
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Barbra Streisand

questions.question: What is Marys occupation in the 1998 comedy movie Theres Something About Mary?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Orthopedic surgeon

questions.question: What type of phobia does pilot Ted Striker have in the 1980 comedy movie Airplane!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fear of flying

questions.question: In the movie St. Elmos Fire, when Leslie is packing up at her and Alecs old place, Alec tells her that music by what artist is not leaving?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bruce Springsteen

questions.question: What Academy Award-winning actor stars in the 1988 comedy movie Big?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Hanks

questions.question: Who is the director of the 1964 comedy movie Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stanley Kubrick

questions.question: Which actress plays the prostitute in St. Elmos Fire, who propositions Kevin outside of the apartment he shares with Kirby?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anna Maria Horsford

questions.question: Why does Michael Dorsey from the 1982 comedy movie Tootsie dress as a woman?

options.text: He believes he looks better as a woman.
To get a part in a film.
He dreams of being a woman.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To get a part in a film.

questions.question: What was the name of the Korean gangster that both Kirby and Billy worked for in St. Elmos Fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kim Sung Ho

questions.question: What is the name of the green ghost captured first by the Ghostbusters in the 1984 comedy movie Ghostbusters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Slimer

questions.question: What is the period that the 1975 comedy movie Shampoo spans?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 24 hours

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Benny
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, birds, villains. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What kind of nightmare does Ed have at the end of the 1972 movie Deliverance?

options.text: His baby daughter tries to kill him.
A dead mans hand appears from the lake.
A deer is chasing him through the woods.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A dead mans hand appears from the lake.

questions.question: During what war is Steven Spielbergs 1998 movie Saving Private Ryan set?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Second World War

questions.question: What type of birds are the villains in Alfred Hitchcocks 1963 movie The Birds?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seagulls and crows

questions.question: Which of the former Cheers characters is in the movie Benny and Joon as Bennys friend Thomas?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dan Hedaya

questions.question: What is the name of Bruce Willis character in the 1988 movie Die Hard?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John McClane

questions.question: Who played the lead character of the movie Benny and Joon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Johnny Depp

questions.question: What kind of demonic power is little Regan possessed by in the 1973 movie The Exorcist?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Satan

questions.question: Which of the James Bond movies starred Pierce Brosnan and was released in 1997?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tomorrow Never Dies

questions.question: How are Benny and Joon related in the movie of the same name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They are brother and sister.

questions.question: What does killer Jame Gumb do with the skins taken from his victims in the 1991 movie The Silence of the Lambs?

options.text: He intends to make a suit out of them.
He keeps them as trophies on his walls.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He intends to make a suit out of them.

questions.question: What is the pet animal that Glenn Closes deranged character cooks in the 1987 movie Fatal Attraction?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rabbit

questions.question: What year did the movie Benny and Joon come out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1993

questions.question: What directed the 1977 movie Close Encounters of the Third Kind?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steven Spielberg

questions.question: Which of these actors did not appear in the 1993 movie The Fugitive?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Nicholson

questions.question: There is a rumor of a curse surrounding the 1982 movie Poltergeist and its sequels. What happened after the movie was filmed?

options.text: A child actress died at the age of 12.
One of the actors was brutally murdered.
An actress was killed at the age of 22.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these
